scenario_text.value: Amazing... There really is a dam here.
Can humans make something as big as this?!

...Certainly. But we don’t know if this
structure here was truly man-made.

Oh yeah, Takuma.
I found this over there a while ago...

I don’t think I could get much use out of
this, so why don’t you take it, Takuma?
Wow, are you sure?

Of course. All of us benefit from you and
Agumon building up your strength.

Oh come ON, Aoi! Have a bit more
self-confidence!
...Sorry, Labramon.
I don’t want your apologies, either!
S-sorry...
Grrr...

You’re perfectly capable in your own right,
Aoi! You should keep your head held high!
Right! I’ll try...

Heh... Heheh... I can’t tell if you’re mad at
me or proud of me or what. Hahaha!
What makes you think I’m mad?!

(Aoi tends to be pretty reserved, but
hopefully Labramon can keep her spirits up.)
All right, let’s go!
We’re off, then!
Yeah... let’s hurry...
